name: Kiwi's Quest
description:
Havatanga, a remote archipelago filled with natural beauty, was once invaded by the evil Professor Laurence Vermilion and his pirates!

Upon his arrival, he turned the islands into huge nuclear power plants and the innocent animals into fierce monsters.

Tyler, a young and adventurous Kiwi, will have to save the islands of Havatanga and stop the evil plans of Vermilion and his mutated beasts!
